name: ui-toolkit
description: UI controls for Intel AMT features

scripts.build-kvm-prod: npm run copy-dep && npm run copy-css && npx mkdirp ./dist && browserify -p [tsify -p ./tsconfig.json]  -t scssify -t uglifyify ./src/reactjs/components/KVM/UI.tsx -s uitk -v > ./dist/kvm.core.min.js
scripts.build-kvm-dev: npm run copy-dep && npm run copy-css && npx mkdirp ./dist && watchify -p [tsify -p ./tsconfig.json] -t scssify ./src/reactjs/components/KVM/UI.tsx -s uitk -v -o ./dist/kvm.core.js
scripts.build-auditlog-prod: npm run copy-dep && npm run copy-css && npx mkdirp ./dist && browserify -p [tsify -p ./tsconfig.json]  -t scssify -t uglifyify src/reactjs/components/AuditLog/App.tsx -s uitk -v > ./dist/auditlog.core.min.js
scripts.build-auditlog-dev: npm run copy-dep && npm run copy-css && npx mkdirp ./dist && watchify -p [tsify -p ./tsconfig.json] -t scssify src/reactjs/components/AuditLog/App.tsx -s uitk -v -o ./dist/auditlog.core.js
scripts.build-prod: npm run copy-dep && npm run copy-css && npx mkdirp ./dist && browserify -p [tsify -p ./tsconfig.json]  -t scssify -t uglifyify src/reactjs/App.tsx -s uitk -v > ./dist/bundle.core.min.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run copy-dep && npm run copy-css && npx mkdirp ./dist && watchify -p [tsify -p ./tsconfig.json] -t scssify src/reactjs/App.tsx -s uitk -v -o ./dist/bundle.core.js
